thread.section_title: The Beaumont - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect birthday treat!
thread.title_full: Perfect birthday treat! - Review of The Beaumont, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jenna B
title: Perfect birthday treat!
text:
Stayed at the Beaumont for 1 night for my birthday and cannot fault it.
The service is exceptional, the lovely staff can't do enough for you.
My husband treated me to a treatment at the spa which was amazing and when we returned to our room there was a birthday cake and note which was a lovely touch.
The hotel is in a great location, near to Oxford St and there are always plenty of taxis to take you where you need to go.
I would definitely recommend The Beaumont, the rooms and facilities are lovely but it's the impeccable service that sets it apart from a lot of other hotels in London.
Thank you for a great stay!
